lenders.name: cv sukajaya
lenders.loan_because:
Cv.sukajaya has established eighteen years (18) were then engaged in rice mills and rice sales, the wholesale and retail distribution system, for the purpose of procuring the period before harvest. This month experienced a long dry season so that the price of rice soared currently require additional capital of about $ 6,000 to maintain inventory and meet the needs of its customers.
We used the previous loan to increase its stake and has managed to pay back all their loans successfully. We did great with and appreciate Kiva loan to support our group.
lenders.occupational_info: an entrepreneur who wants to dedicate his life to the happiness herself, her parents, family and people around him.

Christ the King will say to the people on his right, "Come, my Father has given you his blessing. Receive the kingdom God has prepared for you since the world was made. 

"I was hungry, and you gave me food. I was thirsty, and you gave me something to drink. I was alone and away from home, and you invited me into your house. 

"I was without clothes, and you gave me something to wear. I was sick, and you cared for me. I was in prison, and you visited me."

--from The Gospel according to Matthew, chapter 25, verses 34 through 46.
lenders.occupational_info: Because of the glorious inheritance I have been promised as a child of the one true God, Jehovah Jireh, the true Provider, I am compelled through love to "make disciples of all the nations." lenders.name: Ben Truscello
lenders.occupation: CTO & Co-Founder at The Global Resource Initiative
lenders.loan_because: it may be my only legacy.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am the chief technology officer and co-founder at the Global Resource Initiative (TGRI), a 501c(3) nonprofit organization seeking to improve the productivity and livelihoods of people in the developing world through access to information, expertise and technology.

Agricultural resources and animals, specifically, are the base of many developing and underdeveloped region’s economies and the life-blood of families, cultures and communities. Poor farmers can benefit when information and knowledge is shared locally. They also benefit when given access to global expertise on agriculture and animal health. TGRI is focused on helping to make these connections locally and globally.

lenders.name: A Reason for Chocolate

lenders.occupational_info: We are a private school (Armitage Academy) and own a candy company (A Reason for Chocolate).  Fifty percent of our candy profit enables our students to engage in service activities and support organizations who are helping others.

The mill where I work turns wood chips into pulp, which is processed further to become products such as  paper, food containers, boxes, toilet tissue, disposable baby diapers, etc.  
I have always believed that everyone, man or woman, rich or poor, young or old, educated or illiterate, has something worthwhile to contribute to the community in which they live.  Some have trouble recognizing their worth and others are unaware of how to share it.  Kiva and its lenders give entrepreneurs the ability to improve their own lives, which ultimately enriches their community as well.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I believe that there is more good that can be done with my extra money than to buy something else I dont need. Though many of us dont have much to give... I like to help where I can... and this is a GREAT cause. Empowerment of the world's people. We can all make a difference... and it doesnt take much. What isnt much to us, means the world to these people. Im thrilled to be a part of something so worthwhile and to be given the chance to do something for the rest of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a hotel, checking people in, cleaning laundry, serving.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I care!
lenders.occupational_info: I design motion graphics and visual effects.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: Every morning as I listen to the radio on the way to work, I hear stories of men and women who struggle to earn money to support themselves and their families.  Every time I hear one of these stories, I realize how lucky I am to live where I live and have the opportunities that I have - especially as a woman and a business owner.  I've often wanted to be able to send money directly to those individuals to help them achieve their dreams.  When I found out about Kiva, I realized that here was a way I could do exactly that - to send money directly to real people.  I'm excited to be a Kiva lender and I hope to participate in the program for many years to come!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer.  Professionally, I photograph weddings and portraits.  Personally, I photograph anything and everything.  I am fascinated by different cultures and customs, by history, and by people.  I consider what I do to be as much a calling as a career - to document peoples' lives so that their children and their grandchildren will have those images and memories to share for generations.

I also own a technology & business development firm helping others start their own businesses using technology to help make operations more cost effective and streamlined.

lenders.loan_because: ShopBody.ru интернет магазин товары для здоровья пояса, домашние тренажеры и спортивные товары, утягивающее белье, изделия для похудения и лечения целлюлита, массажеры и миостимуляторы, аппараты физиотерапии и медтехнику, наборы для ухода за руками, а также: термобелье и грелки, фиксаторы суставов, косметику для уход за лицом и волосами, принадлежности и техника для дома и дачи, техника и приспособления для кухни, ортопедические подушки и матрасы и многое другое.
